emogg.config.entry.enable_debug_mode.des: If this mode is enabled, then when using the mod, additional information will be provided, both inside the GUI and in the console. This mode can lead to a decrease in performance, so enabling this mode should be carried out if it is really necessary
emogg.config.entry.enable_atlas_debug_hu: Display the emoji atlas texture and stitching debug on screen
emogg.config.entry.force_load_all_emojis: Immediately start to load all emojis (§cmight cause a game crash§r§f)
emogg.config.entry.reload_all_emojis.des: Clear loaded emoji textures and reload them
emogg.resourcepack.builtin.name: Built-in emojis
emogg.resourcepack.twemogg.name: Twemogg
emogg.message.new_version_is_available: New version is available! Download it at %s
